title: Cerebral palsy: basic abilities
creator_contributor_role: Spastic Centre of New South Wales, production company
subject_group: Literature/Australian literature - Film and video adaptations
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cerebral palsy
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped children - Education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Perceptual-motor learning
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped children - Development
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Public welfare - New South Wales
description: Based on the Book "Cerebral Palsy - Basic Abilities - A plan for Training the Pre-School Child" the film carefully outlines the program used in New South Wales since 1963, in an attempt to develop visuomotor and perceptual learning skills.
